raw_comment:
1. What do I notice?
   I notice that there are more players of color than head coaches of color. Also that there is a higher percentage of players of color than head coaches of color.

2. What do I wonder? 
   I wonder why there aren’t as many head coaches of color. Unlike there are of players of color. 

3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
    This really isn’t a big impact on me or my community because I don’t see people of any color different from anyone else.  Everyone is the same no matter what. It doesn’t really impact our community because everyone is just judged on how they act and how they treat others as a person. Not what there color of skin is. 

4. What’s going on in this graph?
   They are showing the different percentages of colored people between if they are a player of that sport or a head coach of that specific sport.

5. Headline
    The Diversity Between Players & Coaches
ace_sentences: I notice that there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
I notice that the percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
I wonder why there are not many head coaches of color.
There are many players of color.
This situation does not have a big impact on me.
This situation does not have a big impact on my community.
I do not see people of any color as different from other people.
I think that everyone is the same.
In my community, people judge other people by how they act.
In my community, people judge other people by how they treat other people.
In my community, people do not judge other people by their skin color.
The graph shows percentages of people of color.
The graph compares players of a sport with head coaches of that sport.
The headline is: The Diversity Between Players and Coaches.
